fields.name: Aloha – Black Panda XEPS
fields.description:
The Black Panda is a feature packed groveler which absolutely flies down the line and can be turned on a dime.

It has lot of available volume squeezed into a small board to keep the foam both under your chest and feet.

The outline is wide which is offset by a flyer by the fins that keeps the tail width more refined.

fields.name: Bradley – New Barcelona
fields.description:
The New Barcelona by Bradley has redefined what you can achieve in moderate surfing conditions.
 
Following the enormous success or the Original Barcelona the New Barca has incorporated Bradley’s love of the smooth curve by slightly rounding the tail area and nose template. 
Wide nose and tail area combined with a straight rail line give this board extra speed in very small and weak surf. 

Defined by its short length, the New Barcelona has the ability to do standard manoeuvres in small surf. 
A really fun surfboard for those who like to get the most out of extremely average conditions.

fields.name: Kore Surfboard-White/Blue
fields.description:
Kore Surfboards offer a lightweight durable Eps/Epoxy construction at a killer price.

Using a HD EPS foam core the blanks are CNC shaped and hand finished to perfection before being hand laid up and vacuum moulded to ensure absolute accuracy and maximum strength. The result is a very reliable durable board with a forgiving flex.

The Classic Fish is an all round easy riding shorter board. It is a wide stable platform designed to paddle and catch waves easily, but also turn and manoeuvre thanks to the winged swallow tail

fields.name: JP Deva Mid Length Surfboard
fields.description:
This is a modern day single fin. Given the current popularity of retro shapes, we wanted to offer a single fin that was surfable and fun to ride in all conditions. 

The Deva has a retro look, but its up to date bottom contours and foils, give it a stylish and smooth feel. 

Ridden slightly longer to encourage single fin flow and style, we offer this board in all finishes, but recommend it resin tint and polish to encourage that traditional feel.

fields.name: Firewire Thunderbolt Red
fields.description:
The all new TJ Everyday longboard in the amazing Thunderbolt Red technology. The TJ Everyday has a slightly thicker foil, lower entry rocker and flatter bottom concaves, allowing for a balance between performance and nose riding.

Set up with the single fin and side bites The TJ Everyday is going to give you all the wave catching of a standard longboard but with superior nose riding ability and the ability to walk the board. This board is good for all levels of surfing in a wide range of wave conditions, if you are looking for a wave magnet with a fun performance level then the look no further.

fields.name: Alder Delta Point Bodyboard
fields.description:
The Alder Delta Point bodyboard is an ideal first "proper" bodyboard for the adult or youngster who is looking to get into bodyboarding.

The Delta Point is constructed with a closed cell, waterproof lightweight deck (not like the cheap polystyrene), and a hard slick bottom for speed and durability. The Delta Point bodyboard has a proven outline with a crescent tail for control and a 60/40 rail for grip and hold on the wave face.

fields.name: ASD Paipo Supra Bodyboard
fields.description:
The ASD Paipo Supra bodyboard is a really functional, all-round shape with 60/40 rails crescent tail and channels. Suited to any type of waves and conditions and all levels of rider.

These ASD boards are superb quality using high-end materials and contemporary construction techniques. The Paipo Supra has an EPS Core, with a single stringer for rigidity and integrity, a durable CrossLink deck and a PCX slick.

fields.name: Rip Curl Omega 4/3mm Back Zip Wetsuit
fields.description:
The Omega wetsuit is a quality wetsuit that utilises all of Rip Curls standard construction techniques and materials.

Built with E3 Neoprene through the legs and body and E5 Neoprene in the arms ensures you get a lightweight and durable base material. The Omega is stitched together using the same technique you find in Rip Curls premium suits, the seams glued and blind stitched for a strong seal that loses no flexibility.

Its economically priced as an entry level wetsuit and would be ideal for beginner surfers who have just caught the bug!

fields.name: Rip Curl Flashbomb Zip Free 3/2mm Wetsuit 2021 - Black
fields.description:
The Flashbomb represents the perfect balance of stretch and warmth. The 3/4 length E6 Flash Lining, E6 taping and supreme attention to detail makes the Flashbomb the Rolls Royce of wetsuits. 

The Flashbomb Zip Free is one of the worlds fastest drying wetsuits, so that second session on a chilly day is always a much more comfortable affair.

The Flash lining is also incredibly soft and fleecy making it one of the warmest and most comfortable linings on the market today. 

There is 3/4 E6 Flash Lining tape on the internal seams, allowing for maximum seam stretch while giving the ultimate seam sealing and comfort.

fields.name: Vissla North Seas Chest Zip 4/3mm wetsuit 2021 - Black
fields.description:
The North Seas 4/3 is made from V-Foam neoprene, the lightest and warmest petroleum free wetsuit rubber available. Significantly lighter and stretchier, making it easier to get in and out of, along with a full thermal body lining giving amazing insulation and quick-dry properties.

Anatomically correct body panelling and seams give unmatched warmth and pro-level performance. Key features include; a water-tight PK S-Lock chest zip with Cris-X panels for a generous 'step-in' entry, 100% V-Foam petroleum free, Limestone Based Neoprene, Thermal Hollow Fibre fast dry lining, Tailored Fit, Vissla Super-Stretch internal taping, Supratex knee pads, Glideskin cuff seals and an easy access secure key cord.

fields.name: Xcel Infiniti X2 5/4mm wetsuit 2021 - Black
fields.description:
This Infiniti has been treated to some serious upgrades all designed to keep you surfing at your best in complete comfort for longer.

The entire wetsuit is constructed using the new Channel Flex neoprene; a lightweight and even more stretchy neoprene which sheds water and dries faster than ever before. In addition to the Channel Flex outer, the Infiniti is lined with Xcel's Radiant Rebound which features a metal lining under the textile that blocks cold temperatures and reflects the body-heat generated within the wetsuit back towards the body.

fields.name: Alder Kids Stealth Back Zip Wetsuit 5/4/3mm 2021 - Blue
fields.description:
The 2021 Stealth is fitted with a regular back zip for simple entry and exit and the Glued and Blind stitched sealed seams are reinforced with internal critical taping at stress points and seam junctions. The super stretchy X-Stretch fabric is used in the sleeves and underarms for complete freedom of movement and paddle performance. The plush lining in the chest and back gives great insulation and retains core temperature and is very comfortable and soft to touch.

The Alder Kids Stealth would make the perfect wetsuit for the youngster who is keen to carry on surfing when the water temperature starts to drop.

fields.name: Vissla Kids 7 Seas Chest Zip 3/2mm Wetsuit 2020 - Black
fields.description:
Beautifully clean and uncluttered wetsuits made from 100% Super Stretch, lightweight neoprene with a Thermal Hollow Fibre lining which insulates and dries fast. These flexible wetsuits have an immaculately tailored fit which is the key to warmth and comfort.

The 7 Seas wetsuit features a water tight and low bulk chest zip entry, it boasts triple glued and Blind stitched seams with internal Vissla super stretch tape for unrestricted movement and comfort. Supratex knee pads are made from an abrasion resistant jersey for flex, durability and comfort. The ankle and wrist cuffs have liquid tape seals that stop flush and prevent the suit from riding-up in wipe-outs.

fields.name: Ripcurl Ladies Flashbomb 4/3 Wetsuit Khaki
fields.description:
The Flash Bomb in Chest Zip is designed to offer one of the ultimate cold water wetsuits. This is primarily thanks to the flash dry lining throughout whole of the inside of the suit, E5 Flash lining has 25% more stretch than E4 and is one of the comfiest linings available; the lining consists of two layers, one pulls water from your body and the next rapidly funnels it out the suit.

 The whole interior of the Flashbomb has an E5 Flash lining tape to ensure you are as warm as possible, this tape has 25% more stretch, is faster drying and is lighter than E4 tape.

fields.name: Roxy Syncro 4/3 GBS Chest Zip Wetsuit Black
fields.description:
The Roxy Syncro 4/3 has elements of a high-end wetsuits without the price tag. The GBS seams and the thermal lining are things that we see in the top of the range wetsuits that provide the ultimate warmth and flexibility for the user. 

On top of this, the Syncro is now made using limestone derived neoprene. We think this a great step in the right direction for the surf industry and would love to see more like this.

fields.name: Ripcurl Ladies Dawn Patrol Warmth 4/3 CZ Charcoal
fields.description: This wetsuit is 30-40% warmer than last season's dawnpatrol. This leap in progression is because of the addition of the E5 flash dry lining from top of the chest to the chest to the bottom of the knees on the front, and the kidney area of the back. This keeps the heated blood pumping around your body. The triple glued seams with the E5 tape is the only wetsuit at this price point that provides these high-quality features.

fields.name: O'Neill Ladies Reactor II Shorty 2mm wetsuit 2019 - Black/Light Aqua
fields.description:
The Reactor II Spring Shorty is ideal for high-summer here in the UK and would be great for your holidays in Southern Europe and the Canaries.

Perfect for a multitude of water sports applications; surfing, bodyboarding, paddle-boarding, windsurfing, kayaking or just messing about in the water, the Reactor II is comfortably up to the job. 

This ladies summer wetsuit is versatile, durable, warm and affordable and has a great new look for Summer 2019. Constructed with a YKK back zip, strategic seamless paddle zones, and those all-important wind resistant smooth skin chest and back panels.

fields.name: One Hour Surf Lesson - Beginners
fields.description:
Our beginner/improver lessons are a great way to progress from a total beginner to an intermediate surfer. During these lessons you will be taught water safety, how to stand up and when you are ready, how to turn and manoeuvre the board.

All equipment is included in the price.

All our lessons can be block booked in groups of 6 lessons.

fields.name: One Hour Surf Lesson - Intermediate
fields.description:
If you have surfed before or are looking for ways to improve, we have experienced instructors who can help you take your surfing to the next level: From giving you the confidence to practice on your own through to starting to do turns and complete manoeuvres on the wave.

All equipment is included in the price.

All our lessons can be block booked in groups of 6 lessons.

fields.name: Two Hour Surf Lesson - Beginner
fields.description:
A longer more involved lesson for beginners. Spending a little more time on the beach before we head out to the waves, giving you that little bit more confidence with the board.

All equipment is included in the price.

All our lessons can be block booked in groups of 6 lessons.

fields.name: Two Hour Surf Lesson - Intermediate
fields.description:
Giving you much more time on the waves, our two hour lesson focuses much more on board handling and manoeuvres. Great fun with our expert coaches, guaranteed to come back smiling.

All equipment included in the price.

All our lessons can be block booked in groups of 6 lessons.

fields.name: Aloha – Keel Fish PU
fields.description:
This little fish is short, wide and thick with a flat rocker principle for lots of fun plaining speed perfect for smaller waves.
However, these boards can be extremely fun and functional in good quality waves and waves of size.
The classic twin keel fish was developed in the mid 70’s as a knee board by Steve Lis. Pintail surfboards were a favourite of his, but his swim fins would hang over the side creating drag. He decided to split the tail, giving him the width needed to support his fins, while still holding on to the performance characteristics of a pintail
